example.text: The crisis at our southern border is out of control and will only worsen with the expiration of Title 42 tonight. Like the debt ceiling, the Biden administration has seen this coming and failed to act in a timely or meaningful way to address it.

They have left it for Congress to now step in & pass legislation that strengthens our border security, protects the safety of our border agents, & de-escalates this growing humanitarian catastrophe—which is why I will be joining Senator Tillis’ & Sinema’s bipartisan legislation.

My bill, the CHARGE Act, will protect measures currently being implemented by the VA set to expire this month, which will curb veteran homelessness, support caregivers & more. I’m committed to ensuring that those who served to protect us have the support they’ve earned. [[url]]

The crisis at our southern border is out of control and will only worsen with the expiration of Title 42 tonight. Like the debt ceiling, the Biden administration has seen this coming and failed to act in a timely or meaningful way to address it.
By fully funding the Port of Nome & investing in the Polar Security Cutter Program, we can strengthen our commitment in the Arctic, as well as our ability to carry out Arctic missions. [[url]]

They have left it for Congress to now step in & pass legislation that strengthens our border security, protects the safety of our border agents, & de-escalates this growing humanitarian catastrophe—which is why I will be joining Senator Tillis’ & Sinema’s bipartisan legislation.
